channel.title: CVE Feed for Atmail -- Atmail Webmail Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Atmail -- Atmail Webmail Server

item.title: CVE-2012-2593|2024-08-06T19:34:26.067Z -- atmail -- atmail%20webmail%20server
item.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the administrative interface in Atmail Webmail Server 6.4 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the Date field of an email.
